reviewText: A close, intimate and revealing encounter with the Master. Menuhin is so very humble about his unique gift, and endearingly honest and affectionate!
Wonderful and inspiring documentary.  I always enjoy Tony Palmer's work.  Mr. Menuhin was not only a superb musician, but an inspiration.  Truly a life well lived.
A very frank view of Yehudi's life.  One of his sisters provides a frank and not so pretty description of the family dymanics that enabled Yehudi to become the virtuoso that he was.
